verses.verse: Then it came <WH1961> about, when Jabin <WH2985> king <WH4428> of Hazor <WH2674> heard <WH8085> [of it,] that he sent <WH7971> to Jobab <WH3103> king <WH4428> of Madon <WH4068> and to the king <WH4428> of Shimron <WH8110> and to the king <WH4428> of Achshaph, <WH407>

and to the kings <WH4428> who <WH834> were of the north <WH6828> in the hill <WH2022> country, <WH2022> and in the Arabah <WH6160> – south <WH5045> of Chinneroth <WH3672> and in the lowland <WH8219> and on the heights <WH9338> of Dor <WH1756> on the west <WH3220> –

to the Canaanite <WH3669> on the east <WH4217> and on the west, <WH3220> and the Amorite <WH567> and the Hittite <WH2850> and the Perizzite <WH6522> and the Jebusite <WH2983> in the hill <WH2022> country, <WH2022> and the Hivite <WH2340> at the foot <WH8478> of Hermon <WH2768> in the land <WH776> of Mizpeh. <WH4709>

And they came <WH3318> out, they and all <WH3605> their armies <WH4264> with them, [as] many <WH7227> people <WH5971> [as] the sand <WH2344> that is on the seashore, <WH3220> <WH8193> with very <WH3966> many <WH7227> horses <WH5483> and chariots. <WH7393>

So all <WH3605> of these <WH428> kings <WH4428> having agreed <WH3259> to meet, <WH3259> came <WH935> and encamped <WH2583> together <WH9191> at the waters <WH4325> of Merom, <WH4792> to fight <WH3898> against <WH5973> Israel. <WH3478>

Then the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to Joshua, <WH3091> "Do not be afraid <WH3372> because <WH4480> <WH6440> of them, for tomorrow <WH4279> at this <WH2088> time <WH6256> I will deliver <WH5414> all <WH3605> of them slain <WH2491> before <WH6440> Israel; <WH3478> you shall hamstring <WH9432> their horses <WH5483> and burn <WH8313> their chariots <WH4818> with fire. <WH784>"
So Joshua <WH3091> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of war <WH4421> with him came <WH935> upon them suddenly <WH6597> by the waters <WH4325> of Merom, <WH4792> and attacked <WH5307> them.

And the Lord <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of Israel, <WH3478> so that they defeated <WH5221> them, and pursued <WH7291> them as far <WH5704> as Great <WH7227> Sidon <WH6721> and Misrephoth-maim and the valley <WH1237> of Mizpeh <WH4708> to the east; <WH4217> and they struck <WH5221> them until <WH5704> no <WH1115> survivor <WH8300> was left <WH7604> to them.
And Joshua <WH3091> did <WH6213> to them as the Lord <WH3068> had told <WH559> him; he hamstrung <WH9432> their horses, <WH5483> and burned <WH8313> their chariots <WH4818> with fire. <WH784>

Then Joshua <WH3091> turned <WH7725> back <WH7725> at that time, <WH6256> and captured <WH3920> Hazor <WH2674> and struck <WH5221> its king <WH4428> with the sword; <WH2719> for Hazor <WH2674> formerly <WH6440> was the head <WH7218> of all <WH3605> these <WH428> kingdoms. <WH4467>

And they struck <WH5221> every <WH3605> person <WH5315> who <WH834> was in it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword, <WH2719> utterly <WH2763> destroying <WH2763> [them;] there was no <WH3808> <WH3605> one left <WH3498> who <WH5397> breathed. <WH5397> And he burned <WH8313> Hazor <WH2674> with fire. <WH784>

And Joshua <WH3091> captured <WH3920> all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of these <WH428> kings, <WH4428> and all <WH3605> their kings, <WH4428> and he struck <WH5221> them with the edge <WH6310> of the sword, <WH2719> [and] utterly <WH2763> destroyed <WH2763> them; just <WH9201> as Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the Lord <WH3068> had commanded. <WH6680>

However, <WH7534> Israel <WH3478> did not burn <WH8313> any <WH3605> cities <WH5892> that stood <WH5975> on their mounds, <WH8510> except <WH2108> Hazor <WH2674> alone, <WH905> [which] Joshua <WH3091> burned. <WH8313>

And all <WH3605> the spoil <WH7998> of these <WH428> cities <WH5892> and the cattle, <WH929> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> took <WH962> as their plunder; <WH962> but they struck <WH5221> every <WH3605> man <WH120> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword, <WH2719> until <WH5704> they had destroyed <WH8045> them. They left <WH7604> no <WH3808> one <WH3605> who <WH5397> breathed. <WH5397>

Just <WH9201> as the Lord <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> his servant, <WH5650> so <WH3651> Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> Joshua, <WH3091> and so <WH3651> Joshua <WH3091> did; <WH6213> he left <WH5493> nothing <WH3808> <WH1697> undone <WH5493> <WH3808> of all <WH3605> that the Lord <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>

Thus Joshua <WH3091> took <WH3947> all <WH3605> that land: <WH776> the hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> and all <WH3605> the Negev, <WH5045> all <WH3605> that land <WH776> of Goshen, <WH1657> the lowland, <WH8219> the Arabah, <WH6160> the hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> of Israel <WH3478> and its lowland <WH8219>

from Mount <WH2022> Halak, <WH2510> that rises <WH5927> toward Seir, <WH8165> even as far <WH5704> as Baal-gad in the valley <WH1237> of Lebanon <WH3844> at the foot <WH8478> of Mount <WH2022> Hermon. <WH2768> And he captured <WH3920> all <WH3605> their kings <WH4428> and struck <WH5221> them down <WH5221> and put <WH4191> them to death. <WH4191>
Joshua <WH3091> waged <WH6213> war <WH4421> a long <WH7227> time <WH3117> with all <WH3605> these <WH428> kings. <WH4428>

There was not a city <WH5892> which <WH834> made <WH7999> peace <WH7999> with the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> except <WH1115> the Hivites <WH2340> living <WH3427> in Gibeon; <WH1391> they took <WH3947> them all <WH3605> in battle. <WH4421>

For it was of the Lord <WH3068> to harden <WH2388> their hearts, <WH3820> to meet <WH7122> Israel <WH3478> in battle <WH4421> in order <WH4616> that he might utterly <WH2763> destroy <WH2763> them, that they might receive <WH1961> no <WH1115> mercy, <WH8467> but that he might destroy <WH8045> them, just <WH9201> as the Lord <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>

Then Joshua <WH3091> came <WH935> at that time <WH6256> and cut <WH3772> off <WH3772> the Anakim <WH6062> from the hill <WH2022> country, <WH2022> from Hebron, <WH2275> from Debir, <WH1688> from Anab <WH6024> and from all <WH3605> the hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> of Judah <WH3063> and from all <WH3605> the hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> of Israel. <WH3478> Joshua <WH3091> utterly <WH2763> destroyed <WH2763> them with their cities. <WH5892>

There were no <WH3808> Anakim <WH6062> left <WH3498> in the land <WH776> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel; <WH3478> only <WH7534> in Gaza, <WH5804> in Gath, <WH1661> and in Ashdod <WH795> some remained. <WH7604>

So Joshua <WH3091> took <WH3947> the whole <WH3605> land, <WH776> according to all <WH3605> that the Lord <WH3068> had spoken <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> and Joshua <WH3091> gave <WH5414> it for an inheritance <WH5159> to Israel <WH3478> according to their divisions <WH4256> by their tribes. <WH7626> Thus the land <WH776> had <WH8252> rest <WH8252> from war. <WH4421>
